businessUsage: The platform analyzes financial statements to identify potential fraud and anomalies, providing alerts to the finance team.
keyActivity: The key activity is automated fraud detection through analysis of financial transactions and patterns.

metrics.metricDescription: Ratio of correct predictions over total showing prediction reliability
Time taken to process data showing responsiveness
Proportion of correct positive predictions showing relevance
Completeness in detecting relevant cases showing coverage
Balanced measure combining relevance and completeness showing stability
